org.fujion.common

Interface Localizer.IMessageSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BundleMessageSource
    Enclosing class:
    Localizer

    public static interface Localizer.IMessageSource
    Source of localized messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getMessage(String id, Locale locale, Object... args)
      Retrieve a message for the specified locale given its id.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessage

        String getMessage(String id,
                  Locale locale,
                  Object... args)
        Retrieve a message for the specified locale given its id.
        Parameters:
        id - The message identifier.
        locale - The locale.
        args - Optional message arguments.
        Returns:
        A fully formatted message, or null if none was found.
